expectedWarnings.message: This file is used by 1 file directly and affects 1 file indirectly. Review fileB.js and fileA.js before editing.
This file is used by 1 file. Review fileA.js before editing.
This file is not used by any other files. It depends on fileB.js (which depends on fileC.js).
Function 'functionC' is imported and used in fileB.js. Renaming will break fileB.js unless updated.
Constant 'CONSTANT_C' is imported in fileB.js and used in function getConstant(). Deleting will break fileB.js.

notes: Risk levels: low (0 dependents), medium (1-3 dependents), high (4+ dependents or critical function)
For simple chains like this, editing the base (fileC) has higher risk than editing the top (fileA)
OmnySys should warn about transitive dependencies: editing C affects A even though there's no direct import
